thread.title: One night stay
thread.title_full: One night stay - Review of Mercure London Paddington Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: kag-ok
title: One night stay
text:
Used this hotel when I was delayed in London due to train disruption. Very clean hotel but very small room. Staff very pleasant and helpful. OK for one night only but would be difficult to stay longer. Good location and plenty of food outlets around the area.
Close to Paddington Station for travelling on trains.
Room Tip: One night only See more room tips
